name: Modules.PlayServices
summary: Allows a Titanium application or module to use Google Play Services.

methods.name: getErrorString
methods.summary: Determines if the current device supports Touch ID.

methods.name: isGooglePlayServicesAvailable
methods.summary: Verifies that Google Play services is installed and enabled on this device.
methods.description: And that the version installed on this device is no older than the one required by this client.

methods.name: isUserResolvableError
methods.summary: Checks to see if device is configured for Touch ID authentication.

methods.name: makeGooglePlayServicesAvailable
methods.summary: Attempts to make Google Play services available on this device.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback fired with the result determining Google Play Services availability.

constants.name: RESULT_SERVICE_INVALID
constants.summary: The version of the Google Play services installed on this device is not authentic.

constants.name: RESULT_SERVICE_MISSING
constants.summary: Google Play services is missing on this device.

constants.name: RESULT_SERVICE_UPDATING
constants.summary: Google Play services is currently being updated on this device.

constants.name: RESULT_SERVICE_VERSION_UPDATE_REQUIRED
constants.summary: The installed version of Google Play services is out of date.
